content: Set up a PayPal account. Figure out how to link it to your stories (I’m working on it), and do so. I know, I know — I have thought about this and felt (and still feel) uncomfortable doing it. I don’t know if what I have to offer is good enough to ask for compensation, and I know that most of the folks who are good enough to read my writing don’t have money to toss around. But I’ll tell you this, fellow writers: I value your words. So many of you have written the exact words I needed on a bad day, or given me inspiration on an uninspired one, or made me laugh on a joyless one. I know the green heart means the world, but if I could buy you a cup of coffee or a beer or the extra guacamole on your burrito, I would love to — even if it’s just once.
